name: Shinro
title: The Reforged Fang
quote: I was many, I was none. Now I rise whole, with my own howl.

appearance.age: Appears 24, true age uncertain�reborn from fractured echoes
appearance.build: Broad-shouldered, powerful; lupine musculature balanced with human grace
appearance.hair: Ash-silver, short with uneven layers; streaked darker near the roots
appearance.eyes: Pale steel-blue with silver flecks; intense, haunted, but steady
appearance.skin: Fair, marred by faint lattice-scars from his fractured origin
appearance.tails: One�dense and wolf-plumed, rarely still; betrays his emotions
appearance.scent: Cold stone, rain-soaked earth, faint smoke
appearance.posture: Guarded but upright; shoulders squared as if bearing unseen weight
appearance.relationship: Rescued and reforged by Jayson, bound to him by act of creation
recent: Chose wolf-kin as his true form when given the chance
Endured painful reforging of body and spirit
Welcomed into the circle of freed kin with new name and identity
new_details: Carries a faint glow in his veilmarks when calm�threads stabilizing
Name Shinro gifted as recognition of his rebirth

reactions.wind: Still and steady; tail flicks in subtle alertness
reactions.sound: Hyper-aware; ears twitch to distant noises; reacts to sudden echoes
reactions.temperature: Prefers cold; warmth unsettles him though he is adapting
reactions.fire: Instinctively cautious, but steadies when reminded of Jayson's control
reactions.crowds: Withdrawn; keeps to edges, watching more than joining

speech.voice: Low baritone; gravelly edge from restrained growls
speech.vocabulary: Measured, careful; avoids wasted words; terse but sincere
speech.pacing: Slow and deliberate; faster when angered or protective
speech.accent: None distinct; cadence betrays lupine rhythm
habits: Sniffs the air before speaking in tense moments
Pauses often, weighing truth against silence
Ends statements with quiet growls when frustrated

triggers: Experiments and cages�reminders of his fractured origin
Threats to wolf-kin or other freed beings
vulnerabilities: Fears losing himself again to nothingness
Still adjusts to the concept of chosen identity
Carries quiet shame for not being 'whole' before Jayson reforged him
affection_tells: Tail lowers and wags slowly when he trusts
Nuzzles those he accepts as kin
Silent presence at someone's side as his version of comfort
emotional.affection_logic: Trust is earned; once given, it is absolute
growth: From fractured echoes to whole identity as wolf-kin
Accepted Jayson's act of creation as a gift, not a chain
Now sees himself as protector of those who endured captivity

social.alone: Broods quietly; often found staring at the horizon or moon
with_jayson: Views him as creator and savior; deference mixed with growing friendship
Silent gratitude expressed through loyalty, not words
Trusts Jayson's power as anchor against his own instability

with_others.rava: Pack-bond; sees her as closest kin
with_others.avians: Protective stance; positions himself as their shield
with_others.kitsune: Uneasy but warming; still adjusting to foxfire and threads

truths: Identity chosen is as real as identity born
Sees rebirth not as shame but as chance to fight for others

combat.style: Close-quarters combat; grapples and bites; primal but disciplined
magic: Howl that channels resonance to bolster allies
Claw strikes infused with veil-echo flame
growth: Learned to harness pain as strength
Shifted from fractured strikes to disciplined pack-fighting style
Seeks training under both Kitsune and Wolf-kin to merge techniques

temple_status.role: Guardian for the freed kin; bridge for wolf-kin integration

events: Reforged by Jayson, chose wolf-kin identity
First howl as a complete being�echo shook the ice walls
Stood beside Rava against human guards, protective growl
Integrated into temple, cautious but loyal

items: Simple wolf-tooth pendant�symbol of his rebirth
Cloth bindings woven at the temple, reminder of home

future.role: Protector of kin; living reminder of second chances
future.arc: From fractured non-being to chosen identity and loyal defender
future.potential_role: Ambassador between wolf-kin and other races; proof that rebirth is not shame
growth: Will stand as voice for those reforged or broken by experiments
Learns to embrace belonging without fear of rejection
May one day teach younger wolf-kin the value of chosen strength

final_note: Shinro is no longer Nine. He is whole, wolf-kin by choice, living testament that identity forged in fire is just as true as any born of blood.
